# Intro 

Data science now just often machine learning.

DS defined as ...

Should be systematic, methodical, repeatable.

Profiling gets close, but typically limited to surface level summary stats and histograms.

I want to see:
* Deep univariate (rich histograms with opinionated styling)
* Automatic identification of semantic types
* Bivariate
* Euler diagrams for keys across sets
